events.message: I am submitting a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as it involves damage to the insured vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim promptly.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and have started processing it accordingly.
Please provide photographs of the vehicle damage, police report, and repair estimates for claim validation.
All requested documents including photos and police reports have been submitted to support the claim.
The investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle accident has officially commenced today.
Our investigation confirms that the insured driver was not at fault in the collision incident.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repair costs and rental car expenses has been proposed.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely updates during the process.
The claim has been officially approved, with all necessary documents and investigations completed successfully.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued today to cover vehicle damages and associated costs.
This claim is now closed following successful payment and confirmation of customer agreement.
The auto accident claim files have been archived securely for future reference and record keeping.
